Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/accounting/2131968189696585728/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Keyword Strategy"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/accounting/2131968189696585728/)_"
---
Please write in [TARGETLANGUAGE]  

Task: Create a keyword strategy and SEO content plan.  

Input: [PROMPT]  

Instructions:  
1. Identify the primary [KEYWORD] and expand into secondary + long-tail variations.  
2. Group keywords into logical clusters.  
3. Suggest pillar page titles and supporting article ideas.  
4. Assign search intent (informational, transactional, navigational).  
5. Build a 3-month content calendar with weekly topics.  
6. Present results in a Notion-ready table:  
   | Keyword | Intent | Suggested Title | URL Slug | Priority |
PromptHint: A single [KEYWORD] (e.g. Copywriting)  Or a list of up to ~8000 keywords (comma-separated).
